item.title: Climate Quiz
item.author: mail@richardmillen.com (Richard Millen)
item.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, et velit nihil nullam vim, id vim tacimates praesent repudiandae, qui et consul diceret fuisset. 1 What happens to ice when it’s warmed? Show Answer The temperature increases until it reaches 32F (the freezing point of water), then changes state (becomes liquid) and continues to warm only once it’s finished changing state. function showAnswer(divId) { var x = document.getElementById(divId); if (x.
